ETYMOLOGY: From Latin *connexiō* (stem *connexion-*), from *connectere* 'to bind together' (con- 'together' + nectere 'to bind'). The spelling 'connexion' is older, originating from French, and was prevalent in British English; 'connection' became more common in American English and is now widely accepted globally.

MEANINGS.POS_TIP: A word (other than a pronoun) that is used to identify any of a class of people, places, or things, or to name a particular one of these.
MEANINGS.DEF_EN: The act or process of joining or linking two or more things, or the state of being joined.
MEANINGS.DEF_ZH: 连接或结合两个或多个事物的行为或过程，或处于连接状态。
MEANINGS.SENT_EN: The connection of the new pipeline will greatly improve water supply to the area.
MEANINGS.SENT_ZH: 新管道的连接将大大改善该地区的水供应。

MEANINGS.PATTERN: connection [between A and B] | connection [with sb/sth]
MEANINGS.POS_TIP: A word (other than a pronoun) that is used to identify any of a class of people, places, or things, or to name a particular one of these.
MEANINGS.DEF_EN: A relationship or association between two or more people, things, or ideas.
MEANINGS.DEF_ZH: 人、事物或思想之间存在的联系或关联。
MEANINGS.SENT_EN: Is there a direct connection between diet and mood? Scientists are still studying this.
MEANINGS.SENT_ZH: 饮食和情绪之间有直接联系吗？科学家仍在研究这个问题。

MEANINGS.POS_TIP: A word (other than a pronoun) that is used to identify any of a class of people, places, or things, or to name a particular one of these.
MEANINGS.DEF_EN: A point at which two or more things are joined, or a device that joins them.
MEANINGS.DEF_ZH: 两个或多个事物连接起来的地方或点，或连接它们的装置。
MEANINGS.SENT_EN: Please check all the electrical connections before turning on the power to avoid any accidents.
MEANINGS.SENT_ZH: 请在打开电源前检查所有电气连接，以避免任何事故。

MEANINGS.POS_TIP: A word (other than a pronoun) that is used to identify any of a class of people, places, or things, or to name a particular one of these.
MEANINGS.DEF_EN: A person with whom one has a relationship, especially one who can provide help or advantages; often refers to influential acquaintances.
MEANINGS.DEF_ZH: 与某人有关系，尤其是能提供帮助或优势的人；常指有影响力的人脉。
MEANINGS.SENT_EN: He used his connections in the industry to get a fantastic internship.
MEANINGS.SENT_ZH: 他利用自己在业界的广阔人脉获得了一个很棒的实习机会。

REGISTER: Used in both formal and informal contexts across various fields.
